settings.title: How do i track my order?
settings.text: You will receive a tracking number by email and SMS once the product has been dispatched. This can also be found the 'My Account' section on the website.

settings.title: How do i know if an item is eligible for return?
settings.text:
We adopt a 3-day policy as long as the returned product/s are unused, unwashed, and returned with all original packaging and tags.
If a certain style is NOT eligible, it is mentioned on the product page itself.
Free gifts/products won or received in promotional offers are not eligible for return.

settings.title: What about my money when i return my order?
settings.text: You will get a 100% refund of your money in your bank account in case of Prepaid Orders & Store Credit/Voucher in case of Cash on Delivery orders for the amount you have paid towards the returned products. Please note, Cash on Delivery, Loyalty reward points, and shipping charges are not refundable.

settings.title: What is the process to return a product
settings.text:
It takes 5 quick steps to return a product:
Step 1: Go to the 'My Account' section and click on 'Request a Return' button found next to your order.
Step 2: Select the order and the the products you wish to return and the reason for each of them.
Step 3: Click on 'Submit Request'.
Step 4: A reverse pick-up will be scheduled.
Step 5: You will receive a store credit voucher for the amount of the style/s returned

settings.title: How long it will take to process my return?
settings.text:
For domestic orders: 7 to 10 working days.
Note: Currently we do not accept returns international orders.

settings.title: How long it will take to deliver my order?
settings.text: It will take 7-10 business days for your order to be delivered. Please get in touch with the Customer Delight Team for expedited delivery.

settings.title: Is there any additional shipping charge?
settings.text:
For India: There is a nominal fee of Rs.100 for COD (Cash on Delivery) orders. Shipping charges are not refundable.

For International: Shipping charges will be levied basis cart value and location. This will show directly at checkout and will be included in your order.

settings.title: What are the certain products are not eligible for return?
settings.text: Products purchased on a higher discount are not eligible for return/exchange. We mention that the product is 'SALE' i.e. not valid for return/ exchange below the name of the product on the product page in red as well

custom_css: @media only screen and (max-width: 769px) {.type-banner {display: block !important; } .type-banner__content {display: block !important; padding: 0px; } .type-advanced {display: block; } .flex-grid__item {min-height: 380px !important; padding: 0px; } .promo-grid__container {min-height: 380px; }}
.h1 {letter-spacing: 0.05rem; font-family: Aire Bold Std; font-size: 38px; color: #193f47; margin: 0px !important;}

@media only screen and (max-width: 640px) {.feature-row__item {padding: 0 0% !important; text-align: start; } .h1 {font-size: 24px; color: #193f47; margin: 40px 0 0 0 !important; } .h5 {font-size: 24px; margin: 0px 0 20px 0 !important; } p {font-size: 14px; } }

settings.subtitle: solutions
settings.title: OUR PROCESS
settings.text: Most of our products are hand-painted on large sheets before being cut down to size and assembled or run through our antique foil presses. The result is a product line in which each piece feels like a work of art that is meant to be shared.
